trans-unit.source: Isolates into a separate class methods that are used by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control and can be overridden by developers who extend the control, but are rarely needed by page developers.
trans-unit.target: Isola para métodos uma classe separado que são utilizadas pelo <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> controlar e pode ser substituído por programadores que expandem o controlo, mas são necessários raramente pelos programadores de página.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class is the largest class in the Web Parts control set.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>classe é a classe maior no conjunto de controlo de peças Web.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: It is also among the most important Web Parts classes because it is used on every Web page that contains Web Parts controls, and it coordinates and manages all Web Parts controls on a page.
trans-unit.target: É também entre as classes de peças Web mais importantes porque é utilizado em todas as páginas Web que contém os controlos de peças Web e as coordenadas e gere todos os controlos de peças Web numa página.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class is used so frequently, and because it contains so many exposed methods, some methods needed mostly by control developers who are extending the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control are contained in the WebPartManagerInternals class.
trans-unit.target: Porque a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>classe é utilizada, por isso, frequentemente, e porque contém métodos expostos tantas, alguns métodos necessários principalmente para programadores do controlo que estiver a expandir o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controlo estão contidos na classe WebPartManagerInternals.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: This isolation of less-used methods into the WebPartManagerInternals class simplifies the API of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class, and the isolated methods do not appear on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> object in IntelliSense.
trans-unit.target: Este isolamento dos métodos menos utilização para a classe de WebPartManagerInternals simplifica a API do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>classe e os métodos isolados não aparecem no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>objeto no IntelliSense.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: Developers who use the WebPartManagerInternals class are likely to have scenarios where they need to inherit from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control and customize it extensively.
trans-unit.target: Os programadores que utilizam a classe de WebPartManagerInternals são provável que tenha cenários onde tem de herdar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controlar e personalizá-lo extensivamente.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you are building a Web portal application or a packaged set of Web Parts controls with custom display modes, custom zones, custom verbs, custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, and other extensions of the base Web Parts user interface (UI), in many cases (not all) you will need to override and extend some of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> members.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se de que está a criar uma aplicação de portal Web ou um conjunto de controlos de peças Web com modos de visualização personalizado em pacote personalizado zonas, verbos personalizados, personalizada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlos e outras extensões de base peças Web interface de utilizador (IU), em muitos casos (nem todos os), terá de substituir e expandir algumas do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>Membros.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: And although the WebPartManagerInternals class is sealed so you cannot inherit from it, your custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class will likely need to call a number of the WebPartManagerInternals methods in order to manage Web Parts controls on a page.
trans-unit.target: E embora a classe de WebPartManagerInternals está selada, pelo que não é possível herdar a partir do mesmo, a sua personalizada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>classe provavelmente tem de chamar um número dos métodos WebPartManagerInternals para gerir os controlos de peças Web numa página.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Like the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class, the WebPartManagerInternals class provides a server control that has no UI and is never visible on a page.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Como o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>classe, a classe de WebPartManagerInternals fornece um controlo de servidor que não tem uma IU e nunca é visível numa página.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: Unlike <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>, the WebPartManagerInternals class is never declared in the markup of a page; it is strictly a worker object that performs background tasks.
trans-unit.target: Ao contrário <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>, a classe de WebPartManagerInternals nunca está declarada na marcação de uma página; estritamente é um objeto de trabalho que executa tarefas em segundo plano.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: The typical way of using it is demonstrated by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class, which references it by means of the protected <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Internals%2A> property, and uses the referenced object to call the WebPartManagerInternals methods.
trans-unit.target: A forma da típica é demonstrada através de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>classe, que referencia-lo através de protegida <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Internals%2A>propriedade e utiliza o objeto referenciado para chamar os métodos de WebPartManagerInternals.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Internals%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: The WebPartManagerInternals class contains only methods; there are no properties or events.
trans-unit.target: A classe de WebPartManagerInternals contém apenas os métodos; não são propriedades ou eventos.

trans-unit.source: All the methods in the class involve managing <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, or connections between controls.
trans-unit.target: Todos os métodos na classe envolvem gerir <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlos, ou ligações entre controlos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: To handle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, WebPartManagerInternals includes methods for adding them (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.AddWebPart%2A>), removing them <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.RemoveWebPart%2A>), handling events <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.CallOnDeleting%2A>), getting or setting details about their relationship to their zone (for example, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.GetZoneID%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetZoneIndex%2A>), or setting basic <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control properties (for example, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsClosed%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetHasSharedData%2A>).
trans-unit.target: Para processar <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlos, WebPartManagerInternals inclui métodos para adicioná-los (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.AddWebPart%2A>), removê-los <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.RemoveWebPart%2A>), processamento de eventos <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.CallOnDeleting%2A>), obter ou definir os detalhes sobre a relação dos mesmos à sua zona (por exemplo, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.GetZoneID%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetZoneIndex%2A>), ou definição básico <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlar propriedades (por exemplo, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsClosed%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetHasSharedData%2A>).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetHasSharedData%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsClosed%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetZoneIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.GetZoneID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.CallOnDeleting%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.RemoveWebPart%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.AddWebPart%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: To handle connections, WebPartManagerInternals includes methods for deleting them (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.DeleteConnection%2A>), setting which transformer object to use (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetTransformer%2A>), setting whether a connection is shared and whether it is static (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsShared%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection%2CSystem.Boolean%29> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsStatic%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection%2CSystem.Boolean%29>), and setting a connection error message to use (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetConnectErrorMessage%2A>).
trans-unit.target: Para processar ligações, WebPartManagerInternals inclui métodos para a sua eliminação (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.DeleteConnection%2A>), o objeto de transformador para utilizar a definição (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetTransformer%2A>), definição indica se uma ligação é partilhada e se é estático (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsShared%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection%2CSystem.Boolean%29> e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsStatic%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection%2CSystem.Boolean%29>) e uma mensagem de erro de ligação para utilizar a definição (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetConnectErrorMessage%2A>).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetConnectErrorMessage%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsStatic%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection%2CSystem.Boolean%29> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsShared%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection%2CSystem.Boolean%29> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetTransformer%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.DeleteConnection%2A>

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> or server control to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control's collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> ou controlo de servidor para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> coleção do controlo de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlos numa página Web.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> being added to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control's collection of controls.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> a ser adicionado para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> colecção do controlo de controlos.

trans-unit.source: Calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnClosing*> method of the specified control.
trans-unit.target: As chamadas a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnClosing*>método do controlo especificado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnClosing*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> that has been selected for closing.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> que tiver sido selecionada para fecho.

trans-unit.source: Calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnConnectModeChanged*> method of the specified control.
trans-unit.target: As chamadas a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnConnectModeChanged*>método do controlo especificado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnConnectModeChanged*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> that has entered or exited the connect display mode.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> que foi introduzido ou terminou o modo de visualização do connect.

trans-unit.source: Calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnDeleting*> method of the specified control.
trans-unit.target: As chamadas a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnDeleting*>método do controlo especificado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnDeleting*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> that has been selected for deletion.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> que foi selecionado para eliminação.

trans-unit.source: Calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnEditModeChanged*> method of the specified control.
trans-unit.target: As chamadas a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnEditModeChanged*>método do controlo especificado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnEditModeChanged*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> that has entered or exited edit display mode.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> que foi introduzido ou saiu do modo de apresentação de edição.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> object has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: Indica se especificado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> objeto foi eliminado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> that has been selected for deletion.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> que foi selecionado para eliminação.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether the connection has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: Um valor booleano que indica se a ligação foi eliminada.

trans-unit.source: Creates an object based on the parameter passed to the method.
trans-unit.target: Cria um objeto com base no parâmetro transmitido ao método.

trans-unit.source: The method uses the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeGenerator> class to create the type, an alternative that offers better performance than using the <xref:System.Activator.CreateInstance%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O método utiliza o <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeGenerator>classe para criar o tipo, uma alternativa que oferece um melhor desempenho ao utilizar o <xref:System.Activator.CreateInstance%2A>método.</xref:System.Activator.CreateInstance%2A> </xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeGenerator>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the object to create.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>do objeto para criar.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: An of the same type as type.
trans-unit.target: Um do mesmo tipo como type .

trans-unit.source: Sets a property to indicate that the specified connection object has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: Define uma propriedade para indicar que o objeto de ligação especificada foi eliminado.

trans-unit.source: The DeleteConnection method is one step in the process of terminating an existing connection between two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or other server controls on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: O método DeleteConnection é um passo no processo de terminar uma ligação existente entre duas <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>ou outros controlos de servidor numa página Web.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: It sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.ConnectionDeleted%2A> property value to `true` to indicate that `connection` is deleted.
trans-unit.target: Define o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.ConnectionDeleted%2A>valor da propriedade para `true` para indicar que `connection` é eliminado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.ConnectionDeleted%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> that has been selected for deletion.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> que foi selecionado para eliminação.

trans-unit.source: Gets the ID of a zone that contains the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> or server control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o ID de uma zona que contém especificado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> ou controlo de servidor.

trans-unit.source: The GetZoneID method returns the ID of the zone that contains the control referenced by the `webPart` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O método de GetZoneID devolve o ID da zona que contém o controlo referenciado pelo `webPart` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Zone%2A> property of `webPart` references the actual zone object that contains `webPart`, not the ID of the zone.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Zone%2A>propriedade `webPart` referencia o objeto de zona real que contém `webPart`, não o ID da zona.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Zone%2A>

trans-unit.source: If `webPart` is currently closed, the value of its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Zone%2A> property is `null`, and the GetZoneID method will return the ID of the last zone that `webPart` was in prior to being closed.
trans-unit.target: Se `webPart` está actualmente fechado, o valor do respetivo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Zone%2A>propriedade é `null`, e o método GetZoneID irá devolver o ID do último zona que `webPart` estava em antes de ser fechado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Zone%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> that resides in a zone.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> que reside numa zona.

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the ID of the zone that contains webPart.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que representa o ID da zona que contém webPart .

trans-unit.source: Loads previously saved state data for a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"></xref> object that participates in a connection between controls.
trans-unit.target: Carrega guardado anteriormente dados de estado para um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"> </xref> objeto que participa numa ligação entre controlos.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"></xref> that is used to connect controls.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"> </xref> que é utilizada para ligar os controlos.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that contains the previously saved state data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que contém os dados de estado guardado anteriormente.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Removes a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> or other server control from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control's collection of controls.
trans-unit.target: Remove um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> ou outro controlo de servidor do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> colecção do controlo de controlos.

trans-unit.source: Removes `webPart` from the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control's collection of Web Parts controls that it maintains for the page.
trans-unit.target: Remove `webPart` da atual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>coleção do controlo de controlos de peças Web mantém o para a página.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> or other server control to be removed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> ou outro controlo de servidor a remover.

trans-unit.source: Saves state data for a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"></xref> object that participates in a connection between controls.
trans-unit.target: Dados de estado de guarda um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"> </xref> objeto que participa numa ligação entre controlos.

trans-unit.source: The SaveConfigurationState method saves configuration data that is created when a user configures a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> control on a Web page as part of a connection between controls.
trans-unit.target: O método SaveConfigurationState guarda os dados de configuração que são criados quando um utilizador configura um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer>controlo numa página Web como parte de uma ligação entre controlos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer>

trans-unit.source: This configuration data is then reloaded each time the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> control is rendered, by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.LoadConfigurationState%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Estes dados de configuração, em seguida, são recarregados sempre que o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer>controlo é composto, utilizando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.LoadConfigurationState%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.LoadConfigurationState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"></xref> that is used to connect controls.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"> </xref> que é utilizada para ligar os controlos.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that contains the saved state data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que contém os dados de estado guardado.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Establishes an errors message, and causes the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome"></xref> object that is responsible for rendering a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control to render that message rather than the contents of the control.
trans-unit.target: Estabelece uma mensagem de erros e faz com que o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome"> </xref> objeto que é responsável por composição um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlo compor essa mensagem em vez do conteúdo do controlo.

trans-unit.source: The SetConnectErrorMessage method allows you to associate an error message with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control that participates in connections.
trans-unit.target: O método SetConnectErrorMessage permite-lhe associar uma mensagem de erro com um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlo que participa no ligações.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: If an error occurs when another control is forming a connection with the control referenced by the `webPart` parameter, then after the connection process has failed, the error message is displayed in the user interface (UI), rather than the contents of `webPart`.
trans-unit.target: Se ocorrer um erro quando é que outro controlo formam uma ligação com o controlo referenciado pelo `webPart` parâmetro, depois do processo de ligação falhou, a mensagem de erro é apresentado na interface de utilizador (IU), em vez do conteúdo do `webPart`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome> object associated with `webPart` renders the error message in its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome.RenderPartContents%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome>objeto associado `webPart` compõe a mensagem de erro na respetiva <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome.RenderPartContents%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome.RenderPartContents%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> that participates in a connection with another control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> que participa numa ligação com outro controlo.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the text of the error message.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que contém o texto da mensagem de erro.

trans-unit.source: Sets a property on a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> or other server control indicating whether the control has shared personalization data.
trans-unit.target: Define uma propriedade de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> ou outro controlo de servidor que indica se o controlo partilhou os dados de personalização.

trans-unit.source: The SetHasSharedData method indicates whether `webPart` has shared personalization data.
trans-unit.target: O método SetHasSharedData indica se `webPart` partilhou os dados de personalização.

trans-unit.source: The value of the `hasSharedData` parameter that is passed into the method is assigned to the `webPart` control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HasSharedData%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O valor da `hasSharedData` parâmetro que é transmitido para o método está atribuído a `webPart` do controlo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HasSharedData%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HasSharedData%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> or other server control that can have shared personalization data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> ou outro controlo de servidor que pode ter partilhados os dados de personalização.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether `webPart` has shared data.
trans-unit.target: Um valor booleano que indica se `webPart` partilhou dados.

trans-unit.source: Sets a property on a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> or other server control indicating whether the control has user personalization data.
trans-unit.target: Define uma propriedade de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> ou outro controlo de servidor que indica se o controlo tem os dados de personalização de utilizador.

trans-unit.source: The SetHasUserData method indicates whether `webPart` has individual user personalization data, as opposed to shared data.
trans-unit.target: O método SetHasUserData indica se `webPart` tem os dados de personalização de utilizador individuais, por oposição a dados partilhados.

trans-unit.source: The method assigns the value of the `hasUserData` parameter to the `webPart` control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HasUserData%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O método atribui o valor da `hasUserData` parâmetro para o `webPart` do controlo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HasUserData%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HasUserData%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> or other server control that can have user personalization data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> ou outro controlo de servidor que pode ter dados de personalização do utilizador.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether `webPart` has shared data.
trans-unit.target: Um valor booleano que indica se `webPart` partilhou dados.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsClosed*> property of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Define o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsClosed*>propriedade de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsClosed*>

trans-unit.source: The SetIsClosed method sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsClosed%2A> property of `webPart`.
trans-unit.target: Os conjuntos de método SetIsClosed o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsClosed%2A>propriedade `webPart`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsClosed%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method does not actually close `webPart`; it only sets the property that indicates whether `webPart` is closed.
trans-unit.target: Este método, na verdade, não feche `webPart`; define apenas a propriedade que indica se `webPart` está fechado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> for which this method sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsClosed*> property.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> para que este método define o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsClosed*>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsClosed*>

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> is closed on a page.
trans-unit.target: Um valor booleano que indica se um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> está fechado numa página.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared*> property of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Define o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared*>propriedade de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared*>

trans-unit.source: The SetIsShared method does not actually cause the control referenced by the `webPart` parameter to be shared; it only sets the property that indicates whether `webPart` is currently shared.
trans-unit.target: O método SetIsShared não, na verdade, fazer com que o controlo referenciado pelo `webPart` parâmetro a ser partilhado; define apenas a propriedade que indica se `webPart` atualmente é partilhado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> for which this method sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared*> property.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> para que este método define o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared*>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared*>

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether `webPart` is shared.
trans-unit.target: Um valor booleano que indica se `webPart` é partilhado.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsShared*> property of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Define o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsShared*>propriedade de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsShared*>

trans-unit.source: The SetIsShared method does not actually cause the control referenced by the `connection` parameter to be shared; it only sets the property that indicates whether `connection` is currently shared.
trans-unit.target: O método SetIsShared não, na verdade, fazer com que o controlo referenciado pelo `connection` parâmetro a ser partilhado; define apenas a propriedade que indica se `connection` atualmente é partilhado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> between two <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> entre duas <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlos.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether `connection` is shared.
trans-unit.target: Um valor booleano que indica se `connection` é partilhado.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStandalone*> property of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Define o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStandalone*>propriedade de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStandalone*>

trans-unit.source: The SetIsStandalone method sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStandalone%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Os conjuntos de método SetIsStandalone o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStandalone%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStandalone%2A>

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true` on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, it means that the control is not contained within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone.
trans-unit.target: Quando esta propriedade está definida como `true` num <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlo, significa que o controlo não está contido dentro de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>zona.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> for which this method sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStandalone*> property.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> para que este método define o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStandalone*>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStandalone*>

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether `webPart` is a standalone control.
trans-unit.target: Um valor booleano que indica se `webPart` é um controlo autónomo.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStatic*> property of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Define o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStatic*>propriedade de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStatic*>

trans-unit.source: The SetIsStatic method is used to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStatic%2A> property value of the control referenced by the `webPart` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O método de SetIsStatic é utilizado para definir o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStatic%2A>valor da propriedade do controlo referenciado pelo `webPart` parâmetro.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStatic%2A>

trans-unit.source: If `webPart` is declared within a zone in the markup of a Web page, this method sets the property value to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se `webPart` está declarado dentro de uma zona na marcação de uma página Web, este conjuntos de método de valor para a propriedade `true`.

trans-unit.source: If `webPart` is added to a page programmatically, or by a user through the Web Parts user interface (UI), then this method sets the property value to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se `webPart` é adicionado a uma página através de programação, ou por um utilizador através da interface de utilizador (IU), de peças Web, em seguida, este método define o valor da propriedade para `false`.

trans-unit.source: The control for which the property value is being set.
trans-unit.target: O controlo para o qual o valor da propriedade está a ser definido.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether `webPart` is static.
trans-unit.target: Um valor booleano que indica se `webPart` é estático.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsStatic*> property of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Define o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsStatic*>propriedade de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsStatic*>

trans-unit.source: The SetIsStatic method is used to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsStatic%2A> property value of the connection referenced by the `connection` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O método de SetIsStatic é utilizado para definir o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsStatic%2A>valor da propriedade de ligação referenciada pelo `connection` parâmetro.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsStatic%2A>

trans-unit.source: If `connection` is declared in the markup of a Web page, this method sets the property value to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se `connection` está declarada na marcação de uma página Web, este conjuntos de método de valor para a propriedade `true`.

trans-unit.source: If `connection` is added to a page programmatically, or by a user through the Web Parts user interface (UI), then this method sets the property value to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se `connection` é adicionado a uma página através de programação, ou por um utilizador através da interface de utilizador (IU), de peças Web, em seguida, este método define o valor da propriedade para `false`.

trans-unit.source: The connection for which the property value is being set.
trans-unit.target: A ligação para o qual o valor da propriedade está a ser definido.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether `connection` is static.
trans-unit.target: Um valor booleano que indica se `connection` é estático.

trans-unit.source: Assigns a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"></xref> object to be used in a connection between two server controls.
trans-unit.target: Atribui um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"> </xref> objeto a ser utilizado numa ligação entre dois controlos do servidor.

trans-unit.source: When a connection between two server controls requires a transformer so that the consumer control can interpret data from the provider control, the SetTransformer method is called to supply a specific <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object.
trans-unit.target: Quando uma ligação entre dois controlos do servidor requer um transformador para que o controlo de consumidor pode interpretar dados a partir do controlo de fornecedor, o método de SetTransformer é chamado para fornecer um específico <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer>de objeto para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer>

trans-unit.source: If the connection already has a transformer assigned to it, the object referenced by the `transformer` parameter overrides the existing one; otherwise, the object referenced in the `transformer` parameter is used.
trans-unit.target: Se a ligação já tiver um transformador atribuído ao mesmo, o objeto referenciado pelo `transformer` parâmetro substitui a já existente; caso contrário, o objeto referenciado no `transformer` parâmetro é utilizado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control uses the SetTransformer method whenever you call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%2A> method to establish a connection that requires a transformer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controlo utiliza o método SetTransformer sempre que chamar a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%2A>método para estabelecer uma ligação que necessita de um transformador.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> that creates a connection between server controls.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> que cria uma ligação entre os controlos do servidor.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"></xref> to be used with `connection`.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"> </xref> para ser utilizado com `connection`.

trans-unit.source: Sets a property that enables a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> or server control to keep the ID of the containing zone.
trans-unit.target: Define uma propriedade que permite um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> ou controlo de servidor para manter o ID da zona que contêm.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control is being added to a zone.
trans-unit.target: Este método é denominado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controlar quando um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlo está a ser adicionado a uma zona.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control tracks the ID for the zone it belongs to, and this method sets the property that keeps the ID value.
trans-unit.target: Cada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlo controla o ID da zona pertence, e este método define a propriedade que mantém o valor de ID.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> whose `zoneID` property value is being set.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> cujo `zoneID` valor da propriedade está a ser definido.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the ID of the zone that `webPart` belongs to.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que contém o ID da zona que `webPart` pertence.

trans-unit.source: Sets the index of the specified control within its zone relative to the other <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls within the zone.
trans-unit.target: Define o índice do controlo especificado no respetivo horário em relação ao outro <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlos na zona.

trans-unit.source: The SetZoneIndex method determines the ordinal position that `webPart` occupies in its zone, relative to other server controls in the zone.
trans-unit.target: O método SetZoneIndex determina o ordinal de posição que `webPart` ocupar na sua zona, relativo de outros controlos de servidor na zona.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control for which the method sets a zone index.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlo para o qual o método define um índice de zona.

trans-unit.source: The index of `webPart` within its zone relative to other controls in the zone.
trans-unit.target: O índice da `webPart` dentro do respetiva zona relativamente de outros controlos na zona.
